thread.title: Eric
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Eric

author: Eric
title: Eric
text: Order was delivered on time and was 100% correct. The site and this company are focused on you getting what you're looking for and not so much on just trying to sell you the latest and greatest gadget. They have those to if interested. I like the shop by bike and the helpful videos and advice from people who obviously use what they sell. Nice work. I'll be back!
